description: Eastern Redbud (Cercis canadensis 'JN16' BLACK PEARL) is truly an amazing sight to behold. These trees are not just gorgeous, they are also useful. This variety produces dark, purplish-black foliage with glossy leaves that are an excellent addition to any garden. The blooms in spring are simply breathtaking. Dark pink and purple flowers burst from the bud and create a beautiful display. It’s hardy, long-lasting and adapts nearly anywhere and thrives in moist, slightly acidic soils. It’s a wonderful choice for shade, hedges, or larger accent pieces. It’s an excellent choice for any garden or landscape!
